price: E tu verás os anjos em círculo, ao redor do Trono, glorificando, com Louvor, a seu Senhor. E arbitrar-se-á, entre eles, com a justiça. E dir-se-á: "Louvor a Allah, O Senhor dos mundos!"
arabic: وَتَرَى ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ حَآفِّينَ مِنۡ حَوۡلِ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّهِمۡۚ وَقُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُم بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ وَقِيلَ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: watarā al-malāikata ḥāffīna min ḥawli al-ʿarshi yusabbiḥūna biḥamdi rabbihim waquḍiya baynahum bil-ḥaqi waqīla al-ḥamdu lillahi rabbi al-ʿālamīna
